entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
